0.content: Sample dialog entry; this never appears and is for documentation only.

0.1.text: The 'text' field is how this text appears to the end-user.

0.2.text: The 'next' field refers to the dialog element; i.e. setting this to 1 will show the text content of element 1 below.

0.3.text: Note that if 'next' field is set this to zero, this means the dialog window will close; i.e. the end of a dialog tree.

1.content:
Press {1} to change the biome.
Press {2} to randomize the tiles.
Press {W,A,S,D} or the arrow keys to navigate.
Press {Space} to move the creatures.
Press {ESC} to open and close the menu.
